website_summaries.verdict: This set helps you bring the fun and activity of a playground inside your home for active kids to keep playing all year-round.
pros: Great for kids with sensory issues who really need active play
Made to install in a doorway
Attachments are easy to switch out
Includes five different kinds of active play units
Able to hold up to 300 pounds
Easy to put up and take down
A life-saver for rainy or cold days
cons: If you want to use more than one attachment at once, you will need to purchase another unit

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to give 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to give 5 stars, but I had to add extra support and drill 2 small screws in each side of frame to be able to use. I really did not want to return with 4 very active grandchildren climbing on everything. Just be aware if you have decorative trim it may not fit your opening either.
customer_reviews.author: SushiSue

customer_reviews.title: Great but take note of your door frame!
customer_reviews.text: Favorite Christmas gift! The swing is terrific. Very sturdy and well constructed. **Note that the brackets fall right where the door hinges are so you need to take door and hinges off or install in a doorway without a door***
customer_reviews.author: Melissa R.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. The directions leave a lot to be ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. The directions leave a lot to be desired. My husband figured it out, but if a mechanical engineer is frustrated by directions, the manufacturer should take a hint and fix the situation. I noticed others mentioning the directions in product ratings also.
customer_reviews.author: J. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Best home gym ever!
customer_reviews.text: the weather outside might be frightful, and my little monkeys may be climbing the walls, but I can now rest at ease, knowing they have a safe and fun “jungle gym” inside the house. As a homeschooling family, we can quickly get cabin fever, when the weather is too harsh for going outside. We don’t have anymore complaining about not being able to go outside and my kids have a great way to work out their energy without jumping on my furniture and climbing everything they can possible scale.
customer_reviews.author: MET

customer_reviews.title: Personal Park
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son for Christmas he absolutely loves it. A few of our friends are thinking they must get one now as well after coming over for playdates. Initially worried that it might not be stable enough however with the brackets attaching to the frame it is completely stable. Even for a really rough and tumble boy.
customer_reviews.author: jessy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our shelter-in-place
customer_reviews.text: We live in a tiny apartment. We've only just put this up, but already it's getting so much use. After 8 weeks in, my kids were climbing the walls - now we have a way for them to safely do so. Really easy to change out attachments. We only have one doorway that will fit the gym, this is more a failing on our apartment than the gym but do make sure to measure and check where you want to install. The box of bolts was missing from our gym. I wrote to customer service on Friday and Monday morning the hardware arrived, so I was really pleased with the speed of customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Powers

customer_reviews.title: Difficult assembly
customer_reviews.text: Load of crap. Instructions make no sense, screws are not the right size. It assembles crooked, and then after all that work it doesn't fit the door. The main bar should come pre assembled. Don't waste money or time
customer_reviews.author: NonToxicMom

customer_reviews.title: Saved my stairway banister
customer_reviews.text: My 12 yo son is a climber/swinger. We bought this to transfer that energy from my furniture and banister to something more appropriate. I had a problem putting it together. I ended up not using one of the washers on one set of screws. Still, everything is very solid. My son can now put it up himself and I check it for security. He especially likes the rings, the swing, and hanging on the pull-up extender we added. We've had it only a few weeks, but I'm very happy with it and wish I had gotten it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: MsThomsen

customer_reviews.title: A worthwhile purchase
customer_reviews.text: The kids love it. It took me a few watches of the online videos to get it put together and get it installed because the directions in the box are junk, but now it's simple to take down and put up as wanted. It's been a real lifesaver this New England winter (3" into a 20" storm as I type) for getting the energy out when we just can't take being out in the snow anymore. They're active kids and use it a lot, creating new challenges and a game of circus. A bit pricey but a worthwhile purchase.
customer_reviews.author: WMsmomma

customer_reviews.title: The kids love
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! The kids love, just make sure you have a good place to put it. My kids had it in my doorway to my room bc it’s the best place where they won’t swing into a wall! They were constantly in my door way and it was super annoying. My husband constantly hit his head in the pole at night. I took it down and hid in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy! Double check your measurements.
customer_reviews.text: Very fun indoor toy for my busy kiddos. Just double check if you have a door jam that is narrow enough for the vice grip. The doorway width is another thing to double check. We only had one door way that it would work in because the vice grip is limited.
customer_reviews.author: Candace S.

customer_reviews.title: All the extras are not worth the $
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product but the only thing the kids really find useful is the swing. They use the ladder from time, they do not like the rings or trapeze bar. The climbing rope was a fun idea but they more use it for a Tarzan rope. It's fallen off the door frame once. But overall a good product. Maybe buy the smaller package?
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good set for winter use
customer_reviews.text: Good set for an active kid who misses the outdoor during the cold winters. This is probably one of the best purchases I made this winter. My 6 year has been spending atleast 30 mins a day using this set. It was simple to assemble out of box, some of the instructions are confusing, specially the ones about the nuts and bolts that are used. It appears durable and we have tried 2 different doors and it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: LonghornATX

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: My kids all use.this as part of our homeschool PysEd. This provides hours of fun for them ages 2, 7, 10. My husband and I use the bar and I have a yoga/sensory swing we use with it too! Best purchase ever!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Bottum93

customer_reviews.title: Most used Xmas present. Ever!
customer_reviews.text: My girls (5 &8) received this for Xmas and they have played on it at least 4 days a week since (it’s now Sept). In fact, they are laughing on it so hard now that I felt I had to write a review. The swing is primarily their fave but we’ve also had family flexed arm hang competitions, ring performances, etc. I am. It handy AT ALL but assembled it myself with the help of a few you tube videos when I got stuck. We do have a tiny bit of damage to the door frame but it is so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: MelissaChicago

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase just wish it was more adjustable. It does not work on all doors.
customer_reviews.text: The instructions is label wrong. They have the wrong bolts with the wrong numbers. So it was tricky to set up. Once together it super sturdy. Then we went to install it on the kids doorway and the hallway is small. The bars are super long. They go way past the doorframe. I wish there was away to adjust the length. Once we found a door (which is my bedroom door) it works fine. Kids love it. They hit it up just about every hour.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Headache!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this product, and specially during the covid19 pandemic. I needs activities to keep my kids busy. It took my husband a bit of time to put it together because some of the bolts were misnumbered just to realize our door frames are all much too wide. Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Elliot Kahan

customer_reviews.title: Best random purchase for inside quarantine
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a whim before all the craziness happened in March and I was soo happy I did. The kiddos could still get their energy out while being safe and inside. It's held up to hours and hours of swing time. I have a 6 and 9yr old and they absolutely love it! Also perfect for those HOT summer days. The only downfall was that we had to remove the door to fit the swing, so my son has no door. But it's been doable. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Not safe and low quality
customer_reviews.text: Not Safe. Even when properly installed, the mounting method is not secure. Very low quality components for the price.
customer_reviews.author: younger yesterday

customer_reviews.title: An indoor alternative to outdoor play
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a birthday present for a 5 year old. We live in NY and the winter makes it difficult to get outside and play. This indoor jungle gym is perfect! Gets my child up and moving while providing me with (uninterrupted) time to do chores around the house. It’s a great alternative to screentime! Almost one year later and our kiddo still gets excited to use it! It was easy to assemble thanks to the instructional video posted on the gym1 website. We did have a hiccup with installation as our apartments are old and have protruding door frames. We managed to get it up and haven’t had a problem since!
customer_reviews.author: Sanchez Family

customer_reviews.title: Hard to install, main bar is too long.
customer_reviews.text: This was difficult to put together as some of the screws were stripped and didn't fit well. Directions were hard to follow and the pictures were not clear. As a result, it took us several hours to put together. Once it was put together we realized the main bar was too long and not adjustable. We had to order and pay for a shorter bar. We have a standard doorway, but because it's at the end of our hallway there wasn't enough space outside of the frame. The description didn't explain that you need to have several inches ( I would say at least 5-6") in addition to the trim on each side for it too fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For everyone
customer_reviews.text: Fun for the kids...and adults. Placed it in the hallway around a door frame and everyone uses it. Husband is 178lbs, I am 142lbs, kids are 30lbs and 60lbs. Holds well on the frame and kids enjoy swinging inside on the rainy days of Washington.
customer_reviews.author: Britny H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I’ll just say...two months later this is still the best present “Santa” sent.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Bowden

customer_reviews.title: Nice activity for kids
customer_reviews.text: We find the ladders most fun to play with. The material of the rope is too slippery to climb, not like the cotton rope which provides more grips. Installation takes about 1 hour, some screws don’t have the holder on the opposite side to hold it still, so when you tighten it, the screw would also move. Overall it is fun for kids to play for 10min multiple times a day.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Wildly successful in our house!
customer_reviews.text: The kids love this thing. In fact both my girls learned to pump on the swing rig. It's great ... added bonus? Dad gets to use it for pull ups.
customer_reviews.author: nicorellius

customer_reviews.title: Months later kids still use it daily.
customer_reviews.text: We got this for the kids for Christmas, they were thrilled about it. Months later, the kids still use it daily (and fight over it daily...). The bar is very sturdy, and the attachments are all very easy to put on and take off. Their favorite is the swing, and they enjoy coming up with all kinds of "moves" and ideas for it. Great purchase and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Diego Romo

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service to make it right
customer_reviews.text: This gets 4 stars because it had missing parts. But they were sent by Amazon in 3 days. Great customer service to make it right. My kid loves it we also bought a 4 inch mat to place underneath it just in case. Its been up for over a month, ive tighted it a couple times to keep it from getting loose. Great purchase for us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best in door play set ever.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best in "door" playset ever! All my kids play on it through out the day since its been cold outside. I surprise at how sturdy it is it can hold my 218 lbs body just fine. Just make sure to follow the instructions and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Belove

customer_reviews.title: Swing time fun.
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this, especially the swing. They are on it multiple times a day. Does not adapt to wider door frames unfortunately. We had to use some imagination to hold it in place. They just need to make the clamp a little bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this Gym set. Great for exercises I do for seniors. Grandkid loves it too for swing.
customer_reviews.author: LuvWhiteSand

customer_reviews.title: IF YOU HAVE CHILDREN YOU MUST OWN THIS
customer_reviews.text: My kids have been stir crazy since the whole pandemic biz. I stress bought this and I'm so so so glad I did. Snow storm? Buy this. Rainy season? Buy this. Vampire but your kids want to play outside? Buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Dug & Lily

customer_reviews.title: Indoor gym
customer_reviews.text: I am using these words the out the bar. We installed eye hooks and carabiners into beams in our basement and made a gym area for our 3 young kids. We have harsh winter so this gives the kids somewhere to get their energy out.
customer_reviews.author: Syra_87

customer_reviews.title: Quarantine life saver!
customer_reviews.text: With quarantine and temps over 105, this indoor playground has changed the game! My son loves to swing. We used to have to drive 20 minutes to get to swings. Now he swings when he wakes up, when he's bored, whenever he feels like it.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine K.

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: This was slow to arrive, took a long time to ship out. However, it was worth the wait because its easy to set up, exchange pieces. My kids all love it, and it is therapeutic for building up muscles. My two boys age 13 and 5 both have ADHD and Autism and they could play on this all day. I would suggest getting a crash pad because kids also try to do stunts and falls have happened.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Croley

customer_reviews.title: Great !
customer_reviews.text: Wow just love this product ! The weight limit is awesome my older kids love swinging and so do I ! It’s great for the winter to help keep kids active , my 5 yr old swings EVERYDAY more than once a day since Xmas morning !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase during COVID-19
customer_reviews.text: We got this early in pandemic and it has been probably the most loved/used item. The kids (age 8 and 3) love all the different attachments. It has been a lifesaver for rainy days and super hot days.
customer_reviews.author: M. Powers

customer_reviews.title: check frame on door before buying !
customer_reviews.text: I loved this indoor playground ! it is nice but our frames around our doors was not wide enough to support if you have frame that is thick enough a inch or more buy this your kids will love it!
customer_reviews.author: sophie

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great gift for my grandson who is a NYC apt. Dweller. Great for those bad weather days!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Hafer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Winter Energy!
customer_reviews.text: We have five children of varying ages and all of them enjoy this! Our 4 year old just mastered pumping by himself on the swing attachment and uses so much energy playing on here! Our older children enjoy the rings, and our one year old even can hang on here when we lift him up or lower it down! It was a gray Christmas present!!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: I am really happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with this purchase! I wish I could give more stars:) Specially now,when everything is closed because of COVID-19, my 5 yo son uses it all the time! The favorite - is a swing, but he uses other stuff as well. Fit perfect his closet door. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Finally bought it for her birthday and she has loved it. Realitively easy to assemble/put up and the ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was asking for one of theses for months. Finally bought it for her birthday and she has loved it. Realitively easy to assemble/put up and the kids are getting a lot of use out of it. This was definitely a great investment.
customer_reviews.author: CMS

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install on door, after you put the thing together. Putting product together took about 30 mins. Once assembled it clicks on door easily. My child is 7, and 50lbs and LOVES this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a huge hit in our home! My daughter loves it! Keeps her busy and wears her out. When she's getting restless I just send her to this and it seems to help reset her day. I am very happy with this purchase! My daughter is 4 for age reference.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Jaye

customer_reviews.title: ... my kiddos with sensory processing issues and they just love it! Sturdy and they love all the different ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product for my kiddos with sensory processing issues and they just love it! Sturdy and they love all the different things to do with it. Well work the money!
customer_reviews.author: LisaC

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awesome
customer_reviews.text: My kids love love love this! My only issue is that the clap to secure it was too short for pretty much all our doors so we basically had to secure it with nails. But totally work it
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C. J.

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, but this indoor gym is what it proclaims to be and more. My kiddo plays on it daily, and it has not faltered one bit. It’s really restored some of our sanity in this pandemic. I went ahead and reinforced my door frame with hardware, but you’re not required to do that. There was an issue with the climbing rope, but customer service replaced it without issue and promptly. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 8 year old granddaughter loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: Our 8 year old granddaughter requested this for Christmas and actually uses is all the the time and still thanks us for it every time she sees us.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Rainy day heaven!!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this! My 3 boys of 9, 7, 4, (ants in their pants) and me at 30-something (pull up practice!) WELL WORTH THE COST. We have a thick above door frame, so the standard pull up bar does not work in out door frames, but this does! I took off the laundry room door and we have zero issues.
customer_reviews.author: MeanGeneRN

customer_reviews.title: Careful with metal wedge placement.
customer_reviews.text: It required a metal wedge plate to be inserted into the above the door just above the door jam. The one they include with the gym doesnt hold it's place, so the bar became unstable & almost slipped off the door jam during use.
customer_reviews.author: jenalee earp

customer_reviews.title: Be sure you know the measurements and have a well-placed door frame that will accommodate it.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my 5-year-Old son and he is loving it, as are all of his buddies who visit. It is such a versatile toy and allows for the release of lots of energy—a gift to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: MMB

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever. My kids havent stopped using it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my kids because we are all stuck inside because of the pandemic and this has been a life saver. I got it set up 3 days ago and my oldest has only left it alone to eat sleep and less than a handful of small breaks (that we had to force lol). I had to order an extra part that USPS misplaced during shipment, they made it right and I had the part out within 2 days. Thank you so much. I and my kids are loving this indoor playground. Thank you and stay safe.
customer_reviews.author: Josh K

customer_reviews.title: Whole family agrees this was the best purchase! I wish I could get one for ...
customer_reviews.text: Whole family agrees this was the best purchase! I wish I could get one for a double door width since that is the only thing that makes me nervous but the kids use this daily. Easily to install and take-down as needed
customer_reviews.author: K H

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy equipment
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy equipment. We ended up hanging the gym pieces from the supports in our basement for our son to play with like a indoor gym. Great for crummy days outside.
customer_reviews.author: lady jane

customer_reviews.title: With 2 toddler twins at home, life is chaotic ...
customer_reviews.text: With 2 toddler twins at home, life is chaotic. When one is on the autism spectrum, changes in activity/schedules can be very hard on the child. Since we put this up, not a day goes by that one of our children uses it. Those days when the weather is less favorable, this helps keep my sanity keeping the kids occupied.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Covid19 must have!
customer_reviews.text: Great playground while there's no playground. I recommend getting a mat if your kids like doing flips. The swing on its own is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Parker

customer_reviews.title: nice quality, fun for several kids
customer_reviews.text: good for fun exercise while off school...kids took to it right away..combined with mat in case of falls
customer_reviews.author: Renn Kay

customer_reviews.title: Best investment. My children swing for hours!
customer_reviews.text: It took a minute to assemble. I thought I was ready to go straight out of the box. It wasn’t terrible but I loathe assembling things.
customer_reviews.author: LoLo S.

customer_reviews.title: Parent of 2020 must have!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Worth every penny!! You tube video link in instruction booklet makes assembly so much easier!!!
customer_reviews.author: Allison R.

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This has been worth every penny! I wish I had 2 core units just so 2 kids could use it at the same time. The only issue we had was the clamps weren't big enough for our doorway. My husband just made some modifications. This gives my kids something active to do inside during the cold months!
customer_reviews.author: Rosie C.

customer_reviews.title: Best Gift Ever For Families
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for greatgrandkids. Husband quickly set it up so kids could actually swing climb do acrobatics etc. we all had a ball!! Grandsoninlaw saw how easy it was to take down and set up. Best gift ever to give to a family with small children.
customer_reviews.author: Nanahelen

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor swing
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves the swing! She uses the rings sometimes too. She is 3 years old.
customer_reviews.author: ZJ

customer_reviews.title: We live in the Midwest, and this is my ...
customer_reviews.text: We live in the Midwest, and this is my number one life saver during the winter! Save our sanity big time and the kids use it every day through out the day! You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: C. P. Bowles

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This gym deluxe is great we mainly got it becuase of the swing but overall it was a great purchase it's very sturdy and easy to assemble and your kids will love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad if had all parts
customer_reviews.text: Missing parts so you can’t attach rope swing and you can’t adjust trapeze length. Amazon said I could mail back every single thing and they would mail me a new one. Chose not to do that. Due to the size of the box to return it They can just use the other items. But that’s ridiculous for the cost of the item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dimensions not listed and now have to buy separate spare parts
customer_reviews.text: The width of the fully built item was 39", but our hallway was less than that, so it won't fit! The product description listed on Amazon only mentioned about the doorway width, but not the minimum needed for the outer hallway. Now we have to buy a separate part from Gym 1's website to get the smaller bar. Feels like a bait and switch.
customer_reviews.author: AD Mom

customer_reviews.title: Need to be clear on exactly what moldings you can and can not use
customer_reviews.text: Hard to put together. Directions were not that good. Would not fit my kind of molding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 😄😍😘😃🤨😻🤗😄😄😄
customer_reviews.text: Thanks guys! The smile on her little face made me feel proud that I got this for her. Thanks for raising my status to hero!
customer_reviews.author: David Pfeifer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic indoor swing - playgym
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our two children who have autism and it is great - they can swing and climb which helps them with their sensory issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my active son
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect for my son. Easy to install in my rental. Lots of fun
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Best money ever spent! My son has autism and he’s so busy all the time. He gets sad when it’s to cold out to play. This is his everything!! He plays on it all day. Buy it the swing alone is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Shelbi severs

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat easy to assemble, it did take some time and it’s definitely worth the buy! Kids love it and will spend time playing with the various attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Love this gym!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this item! My kids use it every day! In fact, my husband and I will also use it for a few pull-ups every time we pass under it! Best Christmas gift ever!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gary S. Fulton

customer_reviews.title: Best indoor energy burner and skill builder for young children.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best indoor toy ever. Brought this for my 4 year old grandson. He plays with the swing on every visit. I wish I had this when I was raising my sons.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Cabiness

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy indoor playground. Easy to install and dismantle. All the children, young and old, are having a great time with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Quarantine life saver
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for active kids in quarantine (and fun for adults too)
customer_reviews.author: NewReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Robe came burned
customer_reviews.text: The robe came like burned in one end. It might be dangerous if it keeps damaging due to the movement. I contacted seller and never got back to me. A ring accessory is missing for the robe with knots. The rest I love it!
customer_reviews.author: casarocaorlando

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: The kids really love it. It is sturdy and has safety mechanisms to keep it in place. It wasn't difficult to put together. The only thing that was a bit of a pain was getting the right doorway to put it in. Aside from that it's good quality and my kids enjoy using it.
customer_reviews.author: Nilka Alamo

customer_reviews.title: just got this yesterday works great already
customer_reviews.text: instuctions are okay to follow a bit overwhelming to what side is the rigt side. video helped had to rewind several times the screws were not labeled in the box. overall works great my 6yr old loves it alredy
customer_reviews.author: k2020

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, especially on cold days when the kids can't go outside.
customer_reviews.author: Hadyn Stands

customer_reviews.title: Great Indoor Gym For Kids!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love playing on it. They walk by it and they can't stop themselves from playing on it. My son has got way stronger from using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio T.

customer_reviews.title: Great investment for city quarantine kids!
customer_reviews.text: Living in a city with no green space, this has been our saving grace during the quarantine. Such an easy way to get energy out during quick homeschool breaks. My husband and I have a pull-up challenge going as well!
customer_reviews.author: Carri Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Damage and unhappy
customer_reviews.text: I just got the order on May 11, 2020, after waiting 35 days. It was a used product and it also came with no screws. The product was damaged. I would like for someone to reach out to me ASP.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Loads of Fun!!
customer_reviews.text: The gym was easy to install. I live in Phoenix and the outside weather is HOT!!! It is nice to have an indoor play area for my 3 children that is sturdy and most importantly fun.
customer_reviews.author: R. Carbajal

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a blast until it wasn't. Took about a week for it to become unsafe and fall.
customer_reviews.author: megan1230

customer_reviews.title: Nice and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to my nephews and they were very happy. (:
customer_reviews.author: gal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love love love it! Easy to assemble and holds the weight!

customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: The advertisement states it will fit any door frame. ...
customer_reviews.text: The advertisement states it will fit any door frame. We have a standard door frame but had to go back and purchase door extenders for an additional $20 with over a $10 shipping costs. If you purchase this, plan on an additional $30 cost and be ready to explain to your 2 yr and 3 yr old children, who are very excited, why they can only look at their new toy but can’t play with it for another week.
customer_reviews.author: LMesser

customer_reviews.title: My kids loves this but i'm getting grey hairs!
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves this but i'm getting grey hairs! She plays with it every day. It is well made and seems to be very durable. Highly recommend this for an active child who needs to burn off some steam.
customer_reviews.author: BArnold

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: We had this for already six months. My boy loves it! It’s easy to remove; I can have back and ready for play in less than five minutes. Very sturdy and well built. Definitely a great indoor alternative in this COVID-19 times
customer_reviews.author: Mariaelena

product_meta.title: Gym1 Deluxe Indoor Playground with Indoor Swing, Plastic Rings, Trapeze Bar, Climbing Ladder, and Swinging Rope …
product_meta.description:
As Seen on TV, award-winning Gym1 allows your kids to swing, climb & play safely indoors in your doorway. Installs in seconds, no damage to doorway. 

We just changed our name to Gym1 after 5 years to better express the fitness and active play benefits of the Indoor Playground. 

This Gym1 Deluxe Indoor Playground set includes the patented core doorway unit plus swing, ladder, rope, trapeze, and rings. Just swap out attachments into our plug and play silent carabiners in seconds. Now your kids can have fun and exercise in the convenience of your own home. Not only a great item to keep your kids active inside but a great babysitting tool so you can get your projects done while they create life long healthy habits. Great for autistic kids and kids with disabilities, recommended by occupational therapists and healthcare specialists

We've reinvented the cantilevered pullup bar with our patented vise-grips and motional stabilizers to allow your kids to safely swing, climb, and play all day indoors. We use doubly thick steel and first generation quality plastic to make the indoor playground experience a daily time of active play and exercise away from the screen. The padded vise-grips fit right onto your doorway and the force of motion is distributed throughout your framing and walls and not on your trim. Rope is used to minimize sounds to an indoor level; you will only hear the sounds of your playing happy kids not a squeaking metal chain. 

Safety Tested and Certified to ASTM standards
Gym1 provides top notch safety for your loved ones. The Gym1 has been tested and certified according to the ASTM International Standards for home playground equipment.
feature_bullets: Order Now while supplies last and Amazon is still delivering during this quarantine period. New name but same great product that has made kids happy since 2012!
Bring the Playground inside to your doorway at home! For ages 3 and older.
Strong and safe enough to hold 300 pounds yet weighs less than 10 pounds
Assembles in minutes and installs in seconds without any drilling or holes; Fits regular 25" to 36" wide doorways that have trim at least on the top; See product Fit image for details
Includes patented core doorway unit plus swing, ladder, rope, trapeze, and rings
